'''Gambler''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:3-Star Artifacts|3-star]] and [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] rarities.

==How to Obtain==
* Follow one of [[Brother Qian]]'s dialogue branches for a 3{{star}} [[Gambler's Brooch]]
* [[Domain]]s:
** [[Clear Pool and Mountain Cavern]]
** [[Peak of Vindagnyr]]
** [[The Lost Valley]]
** [[Spire of Solitary Enlightenment]]
** [[Sanctum of Rainbow Spirits]]
** [[Under the Umbrella's Shade]] for a 3{{star}} Gambler's Brooch
** [[Fragment of Childhood Dreams]] for a 3{{star}} [[Gambler's Feather Accessory]]
** [[Garden of Endless Pillars]] for a 3{{star}} [[Gambler's Pocket Watch]]

==Gameplay Notes==
* 4-piece set bonus:
** It can only be triggered if the wearer is on-field.
** The CD removal only applies to the wearer.
** The set bonus will enter CD if triggered even if the Elemental Skill is not on cooldown.
